list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment: Refactored NotesListActivity class to fit with the MVVM pattern

list.name: Added viewmodels for viewing, deleting, adding and updating notes.
list.comment: Added viewmodels for viewing, deleting, adding and updating notes.

task.summary: Implemented auto save function. Also, if the user is on edit mode then steps out and returns, app now stays on edit mode.
Refactored recycler view adapter to implement list adapter in order to update notes without to update the whole list
Added viewmodels for viewing, deleting, adding and updating notes.
Refactored NotesListActivity class to fit with the MVVM pattern

MESSAGE.value: Implemented auto save function. Also, if the user is on edit mode then steps out and returns, app now stays on edit mode.
Refactored recycler view adapter to implement list adapter in order to update notes without to update the whole list
Added viewmodels for viewing, deleting, adding and updating notes.
Refactored NotesListActivity class to fit with the MVVM pattern
